FBaseMeshPaintComponentAdapter Base mesh paint geometry adapter, handles basic sphere intersection using a Octree  
FDefaultTextureOverride Provide a default implementation for the texture override(s) needed when painting a mesh component This object will keep track of the overridden material resources and remove the override when they are no longer referred by an default texture override
